short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DGMV Password Extension - Effortlessly autofill your account credentials using the DGMV-ID application, ensuring enhanced security.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DGMV-ID is a complete identity and access management suite designed to secure your digital life and business.

This password generator extension works seamlessly with the DGMV-ID mobile app to help you manage your unique passwords and access websites, services and applications securely in the Web2 space.

Every time you log in to a Web2 platform, the password generator inputs a complex, unique, one-time password to grant you access while completely protecting your identity.

Use the app to scan your unique QR code and open the browser extension, which will then autofill the one-time credentials once they have been generated.

The extension uses a unique IP address for added protection and privacy, and takes care of all your passwords without storing anything.

To use the password generator in the DGMV-ID app, youâ€™ll need to download this extension and set up your password accounts.

The full DGMV-ID solution is optimized for workforce and B2C adoption too, with a new dashboard to facilitate business-wide authentication.

(The DGMV-ID app is available in the Apple Store and Google Play Store)
